body.name: Samsung Galaxy A11 32GB A115U Fully Unlocked Smartphones (Renewed)
body.stockDetail: Only 7 left in stock - order soon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Condition: Certified Refurbished- May have few minor scuffs or scratches
Ships in non-retail box with generic charger and USB cable only. No any other accessories included.

This device is GSM unlocked and will work with T-Mobile, Sprint. Not compatible with Cricket and any other CDMA network. To ensure this phone will work with your carrier please check to make sure the frequencies your carrier uses are supported by this phone.
No longer compatible with AT&T networks
body.description: The Samsung Galaxy A11 combines smartphone essentials with the trusted reliability of Samsung. Take crisp, clear photos and videos with our powerful triple lens camera. Enjoy cinematic clarity on our 6.4" edge-to-edge display¹. Keep going with a long-lasting battery² that keeps going with you throughout the day.¹Measured diagonally, the screen size is 6.4" in the full rectangle and 6.3" with accounting for the rounded corners. Actual viewable area is less due to the rounded corners and camera lens.²Based on average battery life under typical usage conditions. Average expected performance based on typical use. Actual battery life depends on factors such as network, features selected, frequency of calls, and voice, data, and other application usage patterns. Results may vary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Found later I needed more storage..but it is used as a security camera in home now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and honorable seller, NO SCAM and guarantees what they sell! will definitely buy again!
reviews.reviewText: I bought samsung A11 and it arrived quite late (shipping error, not the sellers fault)but the phone kept freezing and took considerable amount of time to respond to touch, and phone would freeze if you took a picture of a moving subject, ie take a landscape photo while driving,I contacted the seller first thing, and seller excepted return, shipped me a shipping label by mail cause I dont have a printer or access to one,also cause it arrived late I had to intercept the package cause I moved already to another home, the seller also refunded me the interception fee for the phonethen, I bought a new one (samsung s10e) from the the seller, waiting for the arrivalthe seller took full responsibility for the item, and their first priority is to make sure their costumers are satisfiedThank you Stalion ReQuip, looking forward to shopping from your store again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars do not trust this seller or amazon "refurbished" claims
reviews.reviewText: when this phone came as "certified renewed" I should have returned it that day as it very occasionally locked/refused input on the touchscreen. within 1 month the screen almost never responded, and locked up constantly. Unfortunately, our personal accts. and other sensitive data were still in the phone with no way to remove or reset, so rather than send back the phone and trust the seller to delete our personal info I was forced to destroy the phone. now we are out 110 dollars. merry Christmas amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely Recommend, Great Condition, Like New, Dependable
reviews.reviewText: I want to start by saying I'm highly satisfied with my new device it arrived on time everything works perfectly and its in prime condition I didn't know what to expect but I took a chance and I needed a new phone asap I'm glad I bought this product and you will be to so if your thinking about buying this phone just go ahead and buy it you won't regret it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Couldnt recieve phone calls
reviews.reviewText: i loved everything about the phone, except that when anyone tried to call my number it went straight to voicemail. i didnt even know that anyone called because it wouldnt tell me i had a missed call. everything else about the phone was fine except that it was a bit laggy sometimes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars working. so far so good
reviews.reviewText: just now put in my mini SD and SIM from mint mobile. very simple and instant setup. just sign into google and you're ready to go with downloading apps and so forth
